tool_description: Request and get small snippets of random facts about who knows
name: RandomFacts-api
title: RandomFacts-api

api_list.name: Get a Single Random Fact
api_list.description: This end point returns  one JSON object
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://randomfacts-api.p.rapidapi.com/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "randomfacts-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://randomfacts-api.p.rapidapi.com/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "randomfacts-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
